website_summaries.verdict: If you are looking for a deluxe home for your hamster, this one is worth the price. It's packed with features to keep your furry little friend comfortable and entertained.
pros: Roomy enough for multiple pets and some larger hamsters
Has numerous components for climbing, hiding, exercising, eating, and more
cons: Pricey compared to some other choices
Although it has space for hamsters like Syrians, the "loft" may not accommodate them

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Syrian!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect cage for a Syrian. Impossible to find anything like this in the stores. Syrians need ground space and my girl loves it!! She was hiding in her old cage bored. Now she plays for hours! Don't even waste your money on the small retail chain cages. They are not big enough and cruel to the hamster. Syrians need more space. DIY or get this.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hamster = Healthy Hamster
customer_reviews.text: Happy Hamster = Healthy Hamster! Best Syrian cage available on the market. I made the mistake of purchasing a cage too small for a Syrian Black Bear Hamster from the local pet store . After visiting the vet for a critter checkup, I was informed the Kaytee Crittertrail cages were not large enough to house my breed of hamster. Not enough overall space and the tubes were too small. The Lixit Heaven Metro cage tubes are perfect size and the play area is excellent. My hamster is extremely happy and healthy. The product construction and quality of materials are very good. The price is high, but this is a cage for the long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Good hamster cage but a little hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage for my son's hamster, but I wish it was a little easier to put together. The plastic tube that connects to the "hamster penthouse" at the top is rather flimsy and easily snaps out of place when you're assembling or cleaning the cage. That said, the hamster loves it. He has built a nest in the penthouse and sleeps up there during the day. At night he plays in the main area below. This is about the minimum space that a hamster needs. We would choose this cage again notwithstanding the difficult assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Tate

customer_reviews.title: Our Syrian Hampster Escaped this Cage
customer_reviews.text: Got our cage yesterday, followed the directions perfectly & put our Syrian hamster in it. Checked on him a couple of times & all was well. Wake up this morning & no hamster. It was able to escape this cage. We did not think he could squeeze out but looking it over again & where you close the cage, the opening where it latches is big enough if the hamster climbed the cage, it could squeeze out. Very heartbreaking as we search for our boy. Hopefully this review saves another furbaby.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece and squeeky wheel gets the worm?
customer_reviews.text: This cage came well packaged. I was impressed on how it was shipped and the box was undamaged. Putting this thing together wasn't hard but it was frustrating. Specially since I was missing two pieces that formed a long tube. Now I have to take the tube system out. The wheel is terrible. Watch the video I posted if you want your nerves grated. So I have to buy a new wheel and my cages capacity is cut by 1/4 for lack of tunnels. I'd send it back if I didn't already have Hamlet running around in it. This cage could have been 5 stars. Could have. Maybe yours will be.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good setup but needs upgrades.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is beautiful and it is versatile. This set is probably best for a smaller sized hamster. It seems big but, it actually just barely meets the minimum space requirements for a hamsters needs. The wheel and the little homes are too small for my average sized Syrian. Do yourself a favor and get a quieter wheel. My hamster also is not able to actually climb up any of the plastic ramps. My set did not come with all the tubes, but after contacting the company, they sent them to me quickly through the mail. Overall me and my hammy are happy. Though it may be cheaper to make a bin or aquarium cage.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyana Toasty

customer_reviews.title: Great cage! Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: After doing research on best hamster cages this was the one we picked it is super sturdy and our hamster has so much more room to run she is incredibly happy now. The water it came with did leak so i bought the no mess no leak glass water bottles for hamsters and the noise less hamster wheel because i love how kuch quieter it was. The bottom part is pretty deep they recommend 6 inches of bedding which this definitely is. Besides replacing their standard equipment this cage is definitely a great purchase! 🥰
customer_reviews.author: jazzy m.

customer_reviews.title: This is THE BEST for Syrian Hamsters
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the best cage on the market. It's huge but still fits on top of my kids dresser. The kids (ages 12 and 10) assembled it all by themselves and it's super sturdy. This is our 3rd hamster cage and I wish we had just gone with this in the first place, it's seriously awesome. A little oil on the hamster wheel makes it silent - otherwise it starts out a little squeaky. :) Do yourself a favor and just get this one first - Whiskers the albino Syrian approves! :)
customer_reviews.author: CMC5

customer_reviews.title: Love the cage but disappointed in customer service
customer_reviews.text: We have had this cage for almost 2 years now and it is really wonderful in many ways. It is a great, large size and has many cool features that has kept our hamster healthy and happy. Unfortunately, the plastic on the green penthouse started cracking pretty early on and over time the tan square plastic pieces have been breaking down causing me to have to do a bit of rigging to prevent an escape. For months I have been trying to order replacement parts and although i’ve been promised on 3 different occasions that they would be sent to me, they still have not :(. If it wasn’t for these issues it would definitely get 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: H. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Great cage
customer_reviews.text: I hated cleaning our old cage so I upgraded to this. I still can't believe I paid for it, but Jeff, a Syrian, has been running around for hours. The directions are only pictures and there were some pieces with absolutely no directions. Tube ends, obviously to keep your pet from the tubes, and a mystery white wire. It looks easy to clean as the top just unlatches. My hamster isn't potty trained so I love that there is a litter pan for him. He did escape, but it was because I didn't have the cage closed back far enough and he's apparently very good at climbing walls. This cage is huge and he seems so happy!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these cages! Perfect for a Syrian or Dwarf hamster. Totally customizable! For my Syrian I left the shelves in, for my dwarf I took the shelves out and added my own hide houses and climbs. Both love their cages. They are huge!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great habitat, but replace the wheel and water bottle.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is great. Super large with lots of areas for our hamster to explore. However, I can only give it 4 stars for 2 reasons. First the wheel doesn't spin well and the stand is too light weight. And second, the water bottle leaks. Both of these items MUST be replaced by anyone who buys this cage. Not a big deal, and I have no regrets buying this cage. It is still the most spacious home we could find, and our hamster loves every part of the habitat. Just know when you buy it that you need to immediately replace those 2 items.
customer_reviews.author: vanv

customer_reviews.title: Great place to live
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster seems to love this cage. It’s nice and big. She likes to move a bunch of fluff into the penthouse and nest up there, or sometimes she decides to live in the tubing. My 12 year old son cleans it out by himself (taking all the pieces apart and getting it all back together), but sometimes I help him to get it really thoroughly clean. The wheel it came with was too squeaky so we replaced it. The water bottle works just fine, no issues (be sure to read the instruction on using the bottle).
customer_reviews.author: J. M. C. Galaviz

customer_reviews.title: Double Latch
customer_reviews.text: Hamster Heaven is truly heavenly, as long as you latch the gate properly. A fully grown Syrian hamster is more than capable of escaping from the cage, if the gate is not double latched. Make sure the gate is is fully pulled to the second bar not the first bar. As soon as we started pulling the gate to the second bar, there was no more unplanned hamster adventures. Bedsides that the cage is amazing and I would fully recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best hamster cage ever!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is amazing! Worth every penny! Easy to clean and tons of space for my Syrian to play! Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: K. H.

customer_reviews.title: I just want to say how AMAZING this cage is
customer_reviews.text: I just want to say how AMAZING this cage is!! They pretty much thought of everything! I do wish the bass were smaller so it would fit on a dresser or something of that nature but my daughters hamster didn’t sleep for the first 4 hours of putting him in it! He explored and loved it! It encourages them to get exercise but putting the smells bowls in different locations. He is pretty chunky and has a hard time getting up the ramps without sliding some so I will have to ad some kind of textured griping to them but aside from that easy to assemble and the tubes r actually big enough for him! He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Syrian hamsters
customer_reviews.text: This cage is like the SUV of hamster cages. Ideal For a larger hamster like a Syrian. My hammy could fit Up through the tubes and loved the space. Only issues are that my hamster could Not get up the pink ramp because it was too steep with not enough grip so I replaced it, and if you or your hamster take bedding to the house on top it does tend to fall down into the tubing. Also, our favorite wheel would not fit on the side with the way the bottom was because it ended up too high so we had to put the whole stand in.
customer_reviews.author: H. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Syrian/Teddy Bear Hamster
customer_reviews.text: Had this cage for a couple weeks and it is fabulous. It's huge, but definitely a needed size for a large Teddy Bear hamster. As other's mentioned, the water bottle leaked a bit but it might have been user error - the lady at the pet store showed me how you need to squeeze the bottle a bit before you screw the cap on and it helps with suction - also, fill it all the way up....that might have worked with the one the cage came with but I still ended up grabbing a new one just in case. Our hamster seems to love this palace.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Folk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and perfect for my Teddy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cage for my teddy. She absolutely loves it! I can hang chew treats from the top onto the second levels which she loves. The tunnels are just perfect because she fits through with room to spare, even when she packs it with bedding. The loft on top is her favorite spot. Also this cage is easy to clean. She is fairly potty trained so all i do is pick out the soiled bedding every day or every other day and then once every two weeks i wash the whole cage down.
customer_reviews.author: krystal hay

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage - written one year after ownership
customer_reviews.text: Our little pet loves this cage. We ultimately took down the tubes since they were difficult to clean and the hamster loved messing them up. But this is a very nice large cage that seems to have ample space for the little critter to play and investigate. If you have room for this larger cage, don't think twice. I read so many reviews and the other gimmicky cages seemed too small or more for the owner, vs the pet. This is a perfect balance. We like it since the platforms are adjustable in height and easy to disassemble to clean. Again, we would buy this over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Maybe an unbroken one is nice but....
customer_reviews.text: 2 separate units broken upon delivery. The one had no visible damage on the exterior of the box so it must have been damaged during packaging and shipped anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkybc

customer_reviews.title: Its huge, but quality could be better.
customer_reviews.text: This cage is HUGE! My hammie loves it!! I just wish that for the price I paid, which is almost double most cages, the quality of the plastic would be better. The bottom part feels pretty sturdy, but the little pieces that come with it are really flimsy. As I tried to adjust one of the huts and it cracked and broke. The wheel is okay, but as well could be better. Water bottle leaks so I had to use my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E.

customer_reviews.title: Best hamster cage on the market
customer_reviews.text: My chubs is so happy. You could tell instantly. Like other reviews he does stuff alot of bedding Uptop but he goes thru it on his own on the tunnels. Monitoring it. The cage has a really pretty design. The wrapping was out of this world, you can tell they really care about their product!!! It also come with a cute litter box and my guy uses it. I plan to have this cage for many many years. Its work the price in my book.
customer_reviews.author: kristina kelly

customer_reviews.title: Make sure main door is patched to 2nd rung.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage for our syberian, long haired hamster! It is spacious and provides him with so many obstacles and cubbies to play in! He loves running through the tubes and up and down the three levels! Something to watch for, and I will try to include pictures, is that the main latch door has to be put back o. The second rung of the cage topper, or A gap is left that your little one can and will squeeze through!!! Luckily, we found out little guy and he didn’t get lost, but it could have been a really bad day had we not found him or recognized the problem. Other then that, the cage is really terrific!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Roof

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing. It is very spacious and all around awesome ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an upgrade! This thing is amazing. It is very spacious and all around awesome living quarters for our hamster. She loved it and couldn't stop exploring. I knew from other reviews this was big but wasn't expecting this big. This isn't a bad thing at all and VERY much worth the price. Now our hamster is obviously very happy and so is my daughter to finally have a great space for her little girl. Thank you! I would recommend this product VERY highly. Not hard at all to put together albeit very lacking directions but not rocket science. The product quality far outweighs the time to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Eric J Houser

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and hard to replace parts
customer_reviews.text: Loved it at first, however had it about a month and noticing that the plastic tubing is very fragile and breaks easily when cleaning them, disappointed that parts are not easy to get. It is also very large and hard to move around if you need to move locations each night due to your active hammie keeping you up at night. I would think twice about this purchase, we had originally purchased the Kaytee brand from Petsmart, should have just stuck with that brand the tubing is much more durable. This is a very expensive purchase wish the tubing & ladder were more better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Took time to Carefully assemble each part but overall it’s very spacious and seems to be a good place for my hamster to live in. Time will tell The sturdiness but some of the plastic parts seem to be fragile but overall I’m happy as this is better than most of the products I compared
customer_reviews.author: comgenii

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughter she was tickled to pieces. Very roomy for a pet Hamster. I was impressed. Glad I paid the extra
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large, quality cage.
customer_reviews.text: This is the cage we have been looking for. All of the tubes, houses, ramps, and platforms are a great size for a Syrian hamster. This is a very large cage compared to what most people think of when they think hamsters, but it is going to bring a lot of entertainment to our little guy. Everything generally snaps together. You can not really change the configuration, but the layout is really nice. Everything is thick plastic or metal.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: This hamster cage is huge, especially if you're like me and buy a bunch of extra tunnels for your hamster to run around in that go on top of the cage. Our hamster loves the size and has the room it needs to keep him happy. This cage is very large. Much larger than you think it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Large Hamster Cage
customer_reviews.text: Large cage for a hamster and lots of nice features. My only complaint is that the top area has become the bathroom and it smells awful if not frequently cleaned because it’s tight enclosed area with a gate. I’d block the hamster from that area except that takes the tubes away.
customer_reviews.author: SeldomReview

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality - hamster escaped
customer_reviews.text: While this is an amazing cage, it arrived with several parts cracked. These are non-structural parts so we used them anyway rather than shipping the entire thing back. However, our hamster escaped through the connection points where the tunnel attaches to the top. We were able to recover her after 3 days, but please check and double-check the connections before trusting it to keep your family pet safe.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Size was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed something bigger for her large breed hamster. He seems to like this one. Agree with other reviews about bedding in the tubes. Her big boy can plow thru no problem tho. Because of its size it’s hard to tote to the garage for cleaning. Small child would need help. Assembly took some time, tubes were tricky.
customer_reviews.author: molly's mommy

customer_reviews.title: So happy with this!
customer_reviews.text: This hamster Hut is amazing! In comparison to the ones made in China, it is so much sturdier. It is also sized very nicely for my Syrian Hammy. He is so happy there. You get what you pay for and this was well worth the price in comparison to those smaller cheap ones.
customer_reviews.author: Lenni

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Perfect size for a teddy bear hamster. It’s like an amusement park-He loves it! The only slightly ‘tedious’ part to clean is the tube. Customer service by Lixit Corp. is absolutely outstanding! My package was missing a tube. I emailed them and was mailed out a replacement part ASAP. So pleased with my purchase and experience I wrote this review! 💕
customer_reviews.author: Debra Marcucci

customer_reviews.title: Good cage, but with a easy to fix safety issue
customer_reviews.text: The cage overall is really big and easy to set up. The wheel is a good size but could run a little better. But my overall problem with the cage is a 2cm gap by the main opening if only closed to the first bar... this issue is fixed if you latch the door to the second bar removing that 2 cm hole.. Unfortunately for my hamster the hole was big enough for him to escape and it costed him his life..
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Great size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve bought this cage twice. I have a Syrian brown bear ham named Andie and right from the start I had read they need a lot of floor room. I bought this cage because it’s big enough for her to run around and she loves the different levels. The first cage broke because I tripped and cracked the floor but I couldn’t find anything even remotely close to the size of this cage so I bought another. We don’t use the green house on top but we just have a tube going from one side to the other. My ham loves it she’s comfy she uses the little huts and it’s very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Habitat!!
customer_reviews.text: My hammy is sooo happy with this cage with a slight set up addition! The slides were way too steep...so I added some rodent ladders from another cage. Other than a squeeky wheel and a wimpy bottle it is a fabulous habitat. It keeps my spoiled Hammy very happy traveling through the tube and she took to the potty sand box right away! There is no smell because of the sand box! Who knew?!
customer_reviews.author: MDrake

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. My students think it’s a McDonald’s play place for our gerbils. It’s very spacious and easy to figure out how to use. Putting the tubes together was the hardest part, but still not really an issue. It’s honestly amazing and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Normandy Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Hampster oasis!!
customer_reviews.text: Hampster heaven! Its so spacious for hampsters to play only thing is my dwarf hampster got stuck in the tubes on top but i dont know why hes small and the tubes are big maybe hes just a dummy lol. But EVERY hampster NEEDS this!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn jones

customer_reviews.title: Provides awesome space/activities for hamster energy
customer_reviews.text: We bought a little hamster, (Cuba) and fell in love. Initially kept her in small aquarium. She was nonstop on her wheel. I read up more on hamsters and realized she needed way more space to burn off their inherent energy. Hamsters will become ill if not given proper space/activity options. So we purchased this large cage. She seems so much more content. She hits the only wheel occasionally now as the cage provides her with endless possibilities for activities. She loves the tubing and the penthouse space at the top. She/we love this cage!
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra I.

customer_reviews.title: Hammie loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great habitat. Our Syrian took to it right away. Had to upgrade the wheel as it wobbles and woke the entire house. Otherwise, only bought minimal other accessories since this cage came with it all. Really happy and so is our hamster.
customer_reviews.author: cmw

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY!!
customer_reviews.text: I chose this cage for its size. I wanted my "Beatrice" to have plenty of room to explore and be happy. So far, the wheel has broken, the water bottle leaks, and the prongs on the tubes are coming off. For the price we paid I feel very mislead. So disappointed that she won't be able to run tonight, and do her normal routine. We have had this cage for less than a month.
customer_reviews.author: Mom*2

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage
customer_reviews.text: Great hamster cage. Plenty of room for a Syrian hamster. Comes with all the accessories you need. Wheel is very squeaky, put a different one in. Tubes are not easy to put together. Really like the cage overall. Haven’t seen anything that compares.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This cage is perfect for a Syrian hamster
customer_reviews.text: This cage is perfect for a Syrian hamster. However it came to us broken. My husband had to try and glue the plastic back together. It was a pain the the butt to fix. I had cancer and was SO sick at the time to make a complaint or return it. Also, the ramps are very difficult for hamsters to get up. Our hamster just kept sliding down so we had to get creative to help her get to the top. Other than that it's a pretty cool cage with lots of room. She seemed to enjoy it once we modified it for her. The price was way too high though.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hamster habitat.
customer_reviews.text: We have a teddy bear hamster and he's been living in a much smaller cage, so my mom talked me into upgrading. I wasn't happy about spending the money but im so happy I did! This cage is perfect for him. He has so much exploring space and tubes to go through. Its a pain to clean because of the size but so so worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Ladders and wheel
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice size cage for a Syrian hamster. I do wish the bottom part was more squared off, but it's not a downer. To fix the squeaking and wobbling of the wheel; I made a thin cardboard washer that I put between the handle and wheel and then I greased the knob, so now it works better. I had to use a hot clue gun and make lines on the ladders for my hamsters to be able to go up them. All in all I really like these cages.
customer_reviews.author: weaver

customer_reviews.title: Fur Baby Heaven
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely, the BEST- Hamster 🐹 friendly cage that I have ever owned (& my last). -Have had many adorable/ fuzzy little 🐹 guys since I was a child & now, I am feeling guilty knowing that all of the cages that I have gotten over the years @ the Pet Stores are far from what I should have had for my Little Fur Baby's all along. This cage is, pricy BUT worth it, -as desribed, easy to assemble & simply the best home for your L'il Fur Baby that you could ever want to own!.. WOOT 👍
customer_reviews.author: BluSky169

customer_reviews.title: Cage
customer_reviews.text: This cage is huge, my Syrian hamster has plenty of room to run around in..........She loves sleeping in the top tube and using the litter box. Since she has uses the litter box to urinate in, I do not have to change the bedding for at least once every 4-5 weeks. I would recommend this cage to any hamster owner. I've attached 3 pictures one of Maryjane sleeping in the tube with a heating pad underneath it to keep her warm. The other is of the cage, and the last one is of her sleeping on her back all comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Lovely cage.
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves this cage and it was a great upgrade from a crittertrail. He is a white dwarf and has been in there a week so far. If you have a dwarf dont assemble the tubes. I put the tubes in at first and he got stuck in there and was too small to get out. I had to take the tubes out and rescue him from them. He is still happy in there without them! Thinking of getting another for my other white dwarf who now just has the 2 crittertrails linked together.
customer_reviews.author: Laurenador

customer_reviews.title: Most Delicious Cage for Gerbils!
customer_reviews.text: I’d say my 2 boys aged 10 and 12 were able to assemble 90% of this cage by themselves and enjoyed doing it. It’s been over 3 months now and held up pretty well. We have 2 gerbils that call this home but it’s more of a mansion compared to other cages. Cleaning has been mostly a breeze as we’ve been able get our hands in the front main entrance. Only issue is our gerbils have been chewing through the slide ramps. The cage is too delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Mansa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great cage. Perfect for my long haired Syrian
customer_reviews.text: Although instruction with nothing but photos is not so easy, the cage is amazing. As for the wheel squeaking, a little vaseline on the stem works wonders!! Just dont over apply so the hammy doesnt eat it. It took him a bit to learn to navigate the tubing he loves it!! The tubing assembly is difficult though. But once together it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Angel J Meisenholder

customer_reviews.title: Great until it shattered when handles snapped off
customer_reviews.text: Had this for quite some time and was very happy. Then I needed to move it and while doing so, the two gray plastic handles broke off at the same time and the plastic blue bottom of the cage shattered when it hit the floor. Fortunately there wasn't a hamster in it at the time but this is a significant design flaw and dangerous. Also a big waste of money given the cost of this product. Use at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: P G

customer_reviews.title: It’s much better than what I started with
customer_reviews.text: This cage is the minimum recommend size for a dwarf hamster. I took the tubes off and do not use the pink shelf. I think it is rather overpriced. I would have went with a tank if I had the space. It’s sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Juanita

customer_reviews.title: Great Cage!
customer_reviews.text: My hamster loves this cage! It is really big and well made. I found a fix for the problem with the lookout above. I used an elbow piece placed it on top of the entrance hole. Now stuffing will no longer fall and the pipe. I did have to cut a piece of the top portion to make room for the elbow, and lift one platform for easy access to the pipe system, since I took the elbow from the entrance.
customer_reviews.author: Iris R.

customer_reviews.title: A really nice size and well built
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so everything you could want, right? A really nice size and well built. Downside is the poor quality wheel, water bottle and two ramps that he can go down but not up, (so he climbs the walls instead). I also wish additional tubes were available and options to vary where they attach. He loves the ‘penthouse’. $$$
customer_reviews.author: jackie wasti

customer_reviews.title: Best Cage for Syrian Hamster!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is PERFECT and should be in stores where Syrians are sold. The small cages are cruel for them. This is easy to out together and easy to clean. The hardest part is the tubes but honestly they come apart to clean making tube cleaning much easier. Hammy LOVES this cage plenty of room for toys and things to keep them busy.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Dee Baker

customer_reviews.title: Best hamster cage ever!!
customer_reviews.text: We finally found a great hamster habitat!! We went through several different cages that just didn’t cut it. This one is SO worth it!! Our Syrian hamster loves it too! This is the only cage where she doesn’t chew on the cage. The layout is perfect, she has tons of room and is so happy in here!
customer_reviews.author: Beth Krug

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Hamster!
customer_reviews.text: The cage is easy to put together though there are a few times I needed an extra set of hands. Our Syrian Hamster loves her new cage. This is a really large cage so you want to make sure you have adequate space for it. It may be a bit of a challenge to clean but I am thinking about using a small shop vac to make my life easier. MAKE SURE you put the main door on the second wire when closing because they will escape out of it if not. We found out hamster sitting on top of it the next day. Overall great cage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it... Very nice size for Hamster. Packaging was good, except loose items inside the cage, the main green level was cracked at one of the support sides (that go between the base and the cage top). It would not stay together when glued. Have to use something under to to prop it up on one side. But totally love it and the accessories that it comes with. 👍
customer_reviews.author: AFoote

customer_reviews.title: Large
customer_reviews.text: Really cool cage. But, tunnel plastic is really fragile..be gentle ! The wheel squeaks . Instructions are junk but easy enough to assemble . Lots of room. Ok product . Maybe a tad more if you consider the size.
customer_reviews.author: BBGB

customer_reviews.title: I have not one bad thing to say about this cage
customer_reviews.text: I have not one bad thing to say about this cage. I just received it today, and put it together relatively quick (it was so easy to assemble, surprisingly!) and hands down, is the best hammy cage I've bought (I have 3 hammies 🐹). I'm so happy with my purchase. And little Horacio has so much room for activities!
customer_reviews.author: Kimdr Acula

customer_reviews.title: Yes it is hamster heaven
customer_reviews.text: I thought my baby was dying in her kaytee mini cage from petsmart. I got her moved into this one and she went energizer bunny for a good 14 hours. She Loooves it and apparently was not sick at all.. she just needed some space ;)
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Knight

customer_reviews.title: Good design, broken parts.
customer_reviews.text: Good design, bad packing or bad handling during transportation. I received three broken parts: one corner of the big blue plastic tray, one corner of the green platform, and one tab of the green ladder. The cost is very very high, so I would be glad to receive a replacement of these three parts. The cage has very good size and great entertainment, but my hamster slips on the stairs, the wheel is very noisy and the tubes a bit small for a syrian hamster. Let me know about the replacement of the broken parts. Nadejda Reikonnen
customer_reviews.author: Nadejda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice home, but hard to assemble the tubes.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent home for my hamster. However the tones arrive in half pipes, and it’s extremely difficult to assemble them. Once I got it put together, it was great! My hamster loves the loft and sleeps up there every day! The only other issue is it’s hard to clean out the tubing. There’s no way I dare disassemble it as it’s very hard to reattach! Still, my hammy loves his new home!
customer_reviews.author: Bekah

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Its safe, secure, spacious, easy to clean, my hamster loves it. Only thing I don't like: the tunnels are flimsy, for example I take em apart to clean them, I have to put the green circles on the pieces immediately after, if I decide to put on green circle and go to connect on another tube it falls apart. For the price I think it could be more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Missing tubing.
customer_reviews.text: It is nice, the room for the bedding is good and the trays add another level. We were really excited about the tunneling too but we were missing one piece of the big tunnel part and I’m not sure where to buy another one. Plus another piece of the small tunnel was cracked. So that was upsetting. Now we can’t use the tubing which would have been nice. It’s pretty disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with a chunk of platform broken off
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cage, my hamster has a ton of room to run around, she loves the top house part and all the things to climb on. My one complaint is that a piece arrived broken, not so broken that it was unusable but broken nonetheless, and it was one of the platforms so if it HAD been worse it would’ve taken a whole level off the cage. For almost 200$ you’d expect it to arrive in perfect condition. Regardless, it’s a good cage and I’m happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne  Schnelle

customer_reviews.title: Ozzy approved
customer_reviews.text: Our hamster Ozzy is in heaven with his new cage. Great quality. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Asher

customer_reviews.title: my hamster escaped multiple times no matter what
customer_reviews.text: This cage is horrible. I have tried so hard to make it so that my hamster could not escape and he did so anyways every single time I would fix something. This is a terrible cage and I would never suggest purchasing it to someone. Don't buy this cage unless you want to lose your hamster forever.
customer_reviews.author: Iowan

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous product. Most pet store cages/habitats are too small, but are sold anyway. Pricey, but completely worth it. My hammy loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Doe

customer_reviews.title: Made my hamster happy again
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller cage for my hamster,but he kept trying to escape. So I bought him a much larger cage with more goodies . Hes back to his old self and much happier.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Your Hamster will live like a King/Queen
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for our Syrian Hamster (Zuraki). You could fit two in this cage comfortably but we decided he needed his own kingdom. He loves it and runs all over the place! We especially love all the accessories that it came with but ended up getting a new water container as the one it came with kept slipping down. It may have been user error so I’m not going to say it wasn’t any good :P
customer_reviews.author: Brenna Saxton

customer_reviews.title: Happy Hamster
customer_reviews.text: love this cage. Very roomy and my little hamster loves exploring in her new home.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is the Poop
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive to cover shipping from overseas (to the U.S.). This cage is incredible, everything the little guy needs. Will see use for years to come and many hamsters over time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McKavanagh

customer_reviews.title: Love everything but the tunnels
customer_reviews.text: The tunnels are so hard to click together and fall apart easily. Ive super glued a few of the pieces together so they dont fall apart but I still dread having to disconnect even a small part of it to clean them out. Other than that I love the size, the little levels and the houses. The wheel wasn't great and I needed to get a new one. Not a deal breaker overall. The tunnels are the biggest issue.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Liggett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cage
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for our Syrian hamster!! So fun and lots of room. It keeps her busy day and night!
customer_reviews.author: jacquie

customer_reviews.title: This cage is A WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT I repeat do NOT buy this cage. I saw several reviews of it being shipped and broken but I took my chance because of the size to give my hamster a better life’s. Sure enough the day it came as soon as I opened the box chunks of plastic were broken off and it was broken. So PLEASE do not waste your money on this OVERPRICED cage when you can get better cage for half.
customer_reviews.author: Willow Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It’s very large. Our hamster loves it! Because it’s size, it does take a long time to clean & the connectors can be trying. Other than that - love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Andersen

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Hamster Mansion!
customer_reviews.text: This cage is ENORMOUS and so sturdy! High quality. I got it today. My large Syrian hamster loves it and I am thrilled with it. She has been entertained for hours already.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Krawczyk

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded my syrian hamster harry to this cage and let me tell you, we are both very happy. Harry used to bite the wires on his old cage bc it was too small. He now has this huge cage and no longer bites on the wires! He has all the space he needs for all the essentials, extra toys, and floor space plus platform left over to roam about comfortably as he pleases. He also nests in the penthouse and its so cute to watch him travel the tubes to get up there. This is truly a hamster heaven! <3
customer_reviews.author: Unicornjelly

customer_reviews.title: The best cage I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this enclosure for our Siberian. So much room and space to make it however you’d like. I recommend this cage to everyone with a small pet. The ones they sell at the pet store are far too small for any living creature. Will never buy another cage after finding this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Happy hamster
customer_reviews.text: The tubes were a little difficult to put together and we were missing one, but i called customer service. They sent it out right away and added a little treat for our hamster for the inconvenience. I had to rearrange the layout a bit, since our little guy like to poop on the loft, but so far its working out fine. Our little guy seems to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy C.

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Great size cage for large hamsters. We had missing tube pieces and were never able to utilize the tubes or upper green nest box. Company never responded to my emails unfortunately. Over all worth it for the size, just wish we would have gotten replacement parts or able to purchase tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Sham

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: It's great for our hamster, the size was bigger than I expected for the price and all the tubes are great for the little thing to scamper about.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna McClaine

customer_reviews.title: Fun to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: People complaining about the illustrated instructions being difficult to understand are exaggerating. This cage was so easy to assemble and the end result is incredible!!!! Highly recommend this cage for any hamster. I can't wait to see my little Peggy explore and grow.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Very spacious!
customer_reviews.text: jujuchan is pretty big so I thought maybe the tubes would be too small, but he gets through! The houses that came with it are pretty small maybe would be better for a dwarf hamster, but the house upstairs is great for Jujuchan. People mentioned their hamsters getting stuck upstairs, but he just picks up his bedding from the tube and moves it upstairs and goes through. Great cage!
customer_reviews.author: takumi86

customer_reviews.title: I love this cage
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage. My hamster loves this cage. But she has escaped twice now. I don’t know what to do. It’s a lot of money to spend on a cage that I don’t feel safe leaving my hamster in. She’s a Syrian too, so not small like a dwarf.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Love the cage
customer_reviews.text: Love the cage, did have damage during shipping, I just hot glued most of the broken parts as I didn't want to wait and or deal with getting replacements. My Syrian hampster is much happier being able to move and I'm not afraid he going to be stuck in the tunnels.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Syrian hamster. Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect large size for a Syrian hamster. Options to move things around. Easy clean
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great cage, but overpriced
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Bought this for my adult male syrian hamster! Great size and has amazing add ons! Overpriced, but a great habitat!
customer_reviews.author: coffeerich44

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cage, my Syrian hamster loves it and doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cage, my Syrian hamster loves it and doesn't get stuck in the tubes; however, I received it with a piece of the green parcel broken. I didn't return it as my hamster really needed the cage since the other one was way too small for him and he was really getting depressed.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Huge but best hamster cage ever
customer_reviews.text: Most fantastic hamster cage ever. It is HUGE so make sure you have room for it before you order. This cage is hamster heaven and so easy to clean. I can only highly recommend it to any hamster lover.
customer_reviews.author: Sab. M.

customer_reviews.title: ... dwarf hamsters in this hamster heaven and it is amazing. It took them a day or two to ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has 2 dwarf hamsters in this hamster heaven and it is amazing. It took them a day or two to figure out the ramps and tunnels, but they love it!
customer_reviews.author: HappyOne

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cage! Not only is it big enough for my hamster, but it also comes with everything you need. The instructions could be a tad bit more specific at times but it was not too hard. Initially, I was worried that the tubes would be too small for my black bear hamster, but it's perfect for her. Overall, this is a great cage and I'm glad I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Great cage!
customer_reviews.text: Taj Mahal of Hamster Cages! However, my hamster will not use the tubes. Pretty much sticks to the bottom and first level. Stinker.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cage!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cage. Be warned that the hamster can get out if you only latch the big door on the first bar. You need to latch in on the second bar. Once we started doing this our hamster hasn't gotten out. He loves the cage. I just wish that I didn't waste my money on the first smaller cage.
customer_reviews.author: lynettefeni

customer_reviews.title: This cage is a giant pain in the butt.
customer_reviews.text: If I had known I was going to have to disassemble and reassemble this cage every time I cleaned it, I wouldn’t have bought it. It’s nice and big, but our teddy bear doesn’t use the slides and the wheel is too stiff for him to use, so we had to buy a different one from the pet store. Really, the only benefit is the size, and even so, our hamster just hangs out in the top compartment, which we call the penthouse.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Haupt

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces.
customer_reviews.text: Received today. It is missing one large tube piece. There are supposed to be 4,but only 3 were in the box.
customer_reviews.author: ksmith

customer_reviews.title: I would only recommend buying this cage is you are willing to buy the extra accessories needed
customer_reviews.text: The cage size is great !! But hamsters can’t climb up or down the slides, the water bottle leaks a lot and they did not send the clear tubes so the hamsters can get into the green house that goes on top of the cage. I would only recommend this cage if you’re willing to buy the extra accessories needed.
customer_reviews.author: Le_eahh

product_meta.title: Savic Hamster Heaven Metro Cage
product_meta.description: The Hamster Heaven Metro Hamster cage comes complete with tunnels, platforms, slides, houses, exercise wheel, toilet, food bowls and drinking bottle. Made in Belgium. Solid metal cage offering enourmous space to your pet. 31 1/2x20x20 inch.
feature_bullets: EVERYTHING YOU NEED: the cage comes with lots of accessories including tunnels, exercise wheel, two houses, a penthouse, a water bottle and more.
HUGE SIZE: The hamster heaven metro cage lets you build a heavenly home for you hamster. The cage measures 80cm x 50 cm x 50cm with 9.5mm bar spacing.
LARGE BASE: The large lower area ensures your pet will have lost of frolicking and tunneling fun.
EASY TO MOVE: the cage comes with two large handles so you can move the cage to any location. The large door gives you easy access to your hamster.
The cage is proudly made in Belgium. Additional tubes are available to customize you hamster house.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
